competitors.name: TikTok
competitors.notes: Most downloaded app, nearly 2B downloads, 800M+ users

competitors.name: Google
competitors.notes: 70% of digital ad dollars with Amazon & Facebook

competitors.name: VK
competitors.notes: 85M active users in Russia vs Facebook's 8M

context: TikTok emerged as formidable competitor. Facebook launched Reels (Aug 2020) and Rooms. Pandemic accelerated digital adoption.
